metadata.description: Custom training data for lease clause classification

training_data.text: The monthly rent shall be $1,500, due on the first day of each month.
training_data.label: rent_payment

training_data.text: Late payment of rent will incur a fee of 5% of the monthly rent amount.
training_data.label: rent_payment

training_data.text: A security deposit of $3,000 is required prior to move-in.
training_data.label: security_deposit

training_data.text: The security deposit shall be returned within 30 days of lease termination.
training_data.label: security_deposit

training_data.text: Tenant is responsible for routine maintenance and minor repairs under $100.
training_data.label: maintenance

training_data.text: Landlord shall maintain all major systems including HVAC, plumbing, and electrical.
training_data.label: maintenance

training_data.text: Either party may terminate this lease with 60 days written notice.
training_data.label: termination

training_data.text: Early termination requires payment of two months rent as penalty.
training_data.label: termination

training_data.text: Tenant is responsible for all utilities including gas, electric, and water.
training_data.label: utilities

training_data.text: Landlord pays for water and trash removal; tenant pays electric and gas.
training_data.label: utilities

training_data.text: No pets are allowed on the premises without prior written consent.
training_data.label: pets

training_data.text: A non-refundable pet deposit of $500 is required for each approved pet.
training_data.label: pets

training_data.text: Tenant may not sublet the premises without prior written consent from landlord.
training_data.label: subletting

training_data.text: Short-term rentals such as Airbnb are expressly prohibited.
training_data.label: subletting

training_data.text: Tenant must maintain renter's insurance with minimum coverage of $100,000.
training_data.label: insurance

training_data.text: Proof of insurance must be provided to landlord before move-in.
training_data.label: insurance

training_data.text: Failure to pay rent within 10 days constitutes default under this lease.
training_data.label: default

training_data.text: Upon default, landlord may pursue all legal remedies including eviction.
training_data.label: default

training_data.text: This lease shall be governed by the laws of the State of California.
training_data.label: other

training_data.text: The premises shall be used exclusively for residential purposes.
training_data.label: other
